items.text: Exercise and sweating relieves my stress
I cope by talking to friends or family
I process stress with alone time
I find the cause and solve problems immediately
I find calm through meditation, yoga, or breathing
I immerse myself in hobbies or favorite activities
A good sleep makes my stress disappear
